user_input:
Create a commercial for build an immersive ad with people doing something funny to help spread the name of our company . 
        Style: Cinematic. 
        Mood: Premium, Playful. 
        Camera: Steadicam, Gimbal. 
        Target platform: YouTube TV. 
        Duration: 15s. 
        URL: https://botspot.trade/.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: Stuck in the Overthink Olympics? Let BotSpot free your mind. Trade smarter, not harder.

scenes.visual_prompt: Shot on RED Komodo 6K with vintage Helios 44-2 58mm lenses for signature swirly bokeh. Kodak Portra 400 film stock emulation with lifted blacks and warm midtones. Heavy halation blooming around window light, visible chromatic aberration on edges, 35mm grain structure at ISO 1600. Natural skin texture preserved with visible pores and micro-expressions. Steadicam with subtle organic drift, never locked-off. A 30-year-old man, short dark hair, wearing a stylish minimalist grey hoodie, intensely squinting at his smartphone screen, which displays abstract stock charts. His brow is furrowed with exaggerated concentration. Extreme close-up on the man's face, slightly Dutch angle, focused on his squinting eyes and tense expression, centered in safe zone. Soft, diffused natural daylight streaming through large windows, creating heavy halation halos around the window edges in the background. Gentle wraparound light on his face, shadows present but not harsh. Golden hour warmth, practical warm Edison bulbs blurred in the background. Vintage_analog color grade, Kodak Portra 400 film stock emulation with lifted blacks and warm midtones. Shot on RED Komodo 6K with vintage Helios 44-2 58mm lens for signature swirly bokeh, preserving natural skin texture with visible pores and micro-expressions.
scenes.audio_prompt: Quiet ambient coffee shop murmur with clinking of cups, subtle soft jazz in the background.
scenes.motion_prompt: Steadicam with subtle organic drift, slowly pushing in on the man's face, never locked-off.
scenes.subject_description: A 30-year-old man with short dark hair, wearing a stylish minimalist grey hoodie. His natural skin texture with visible pores and micro-expressions is preserved, and he is intensely squinting with a tense expression.

scenes.visual_prompt:
[CONSISTENCY CRITICAL] Feature the same 30-year-old man from Scene 1 (A 30-year-old man with short dark hair, wearing a stylish minimalist grey hoodie. His natural skin texture with visible pores and micro-expressions is preserved, and he is intensely squinting with a tense expression.).

Shot on RED Komodo 6K with vintage Helios 44-2 58mm lenses for signature swirly bokeh. Kodak Portra 400 film stock emulation with lifted blacks and warm midtones. Heavy halation blooming around window light, visible chromatic aberration on edges, 35mm grain structure at ISO 1600. Natural skin texture preserved with visible pores and micro-expressions. Steadicam with subtle organic drift, never locked-off. Two other friends and the man from scene 1 at the same premium coffee shop table. A 32-year-old woman with long curly red hair, wearing a stylish olive green blazer, is fake meditating with eyes closed and an exaggerated frown. A 28-year-old man, clean-shaven, wearing a denim shirt, frantically scribbles complex, nonsensical equations on a napkin with a tiny pen, surrounded by scattered coffee cups. The man from scene 1 is still intensely focused on his phone. All are centered in the safe zone. Medium shot, chest to head framing, slightly high angle, observing the three overthinking friends at the table. Soft, diffused natural daylight flooding through large windows, creating heavy halation halos around the window edges. Gentle wraparound light on their faces, shadows present but not harsh. Golden hour warmth, practical warm Edison bulbs blurred in the background. Vintage_analog color grade, Kodak Portra 400 film stock emulation with lifted blacks and warm midtones. Shot on RED Komodo 6K with vintage Helios 44-2 58mm lenses for signature swirly bokeh, preserving natural skin texture with visible pores and micro-expressions.
scenes.audio_prompt: Continues quiet ambient coffee shop murmur, soft jazz, subtle rustling of a napkin, muffled frustrated sighs.
scenes.motion_prompt: Steadicam with subtle organic drift, slowly revealing the three friends' exaggerated actions from left to right, never locked-off.
scenes.subject_reference: the same 30-year-old man from Scene 1 (A 30-year-old man with short dark hair, wearing a stylish minimalist grey hoodie. His natural skin texture with visible pores and micro-expressions is preserved, and he is intensely squinting with a tense expression.)

scenes.visual_prompt:
[CONSISTENCY CRITICAL] Feature the same 30-year-old man from Scene 1 (A 30-year-old man with short dark hair, wearing a stylish minimalist grey hoodie. His natural skin texture with visible pores and micro-expressions is preserved, and he is intensely squinting with a tense expression.).

Shot on RED Komodo 6K with vintage Helios 44-2 58mm lenses for signature swirly bokeh. Kodak Portra 400 film stock emulation with lifted blacks and warm midtones. Heavy halation blooming around window light, visible chromatic aberration on edges, 35mm grain structure at ISO 1600. Natural skin texture preserved with visible pores and micro-expressions. Steadicam with subtle organic drift, never locked-off. A 35-year-old woman with sleek, dark hair pulled back, wearing a premium cream-colored knit sweater, casually sipping coffee at the same table. Her phone is face-down on the table. She has a serene, knowing smirk on her face, observing the overthinking friends. Her posture is relaxed and confident. She winks subtly at the camera. Centered in the safe zone. Medium shot, chest to head framing, eye level, capturing her relaxed demeanor and knowing smirk. Soft, diffused natural daylight flooding through large windows, creating heavy halation halos around the window edges. Gentle wraparound light on her face, shadows present but not harsh. Golden hour warmth, practical warm Edison bulbs blurred in the background. Vintage_analog color grade, Kodak Portra 400 film stock emulation with lifted blacks and warm midtones. Shot on RED Komodo 6K with vintage Helios 44-2 58mm lenses for signature swirly bokeh, preserving natural skin texture with visible pores and micro-expressions.
scenes.audio_prompt: Coffee shop ambient sound fades slightly, highlighting the subtle clink of her cup, followed by a soft, almost imperceptible 'pop' sound as she winks.
scenes.motion_prompt: Quick whip-pan from the overthinking friends to this relaxed woman. The camera then holds steady with subtle breathing movement, never locked-off.
scenes.subject_reference: the same 30-year-old man from Scene 1 (A 30-year-old man with short dark hair, wearing a stylish minimalist grey hoodie. His natural skin texture with visible pores and micro-expressions is preserved, and he is intensely squinting with a tense expression.)

strategy.visual_language: Shot on RED Komodo 6K with vintage Helios 44-2 58mm lenses for signature swirly bokeh. Kodak Portra 400 film stock emulation with lifted blacks and warm midtones. Heavy halation blooming around window light, visible chromatic aberration on edges, 35mm grain structure at ISO 1600. Natural skin texture preserved with visible pores and micro-expressions. Steadicam with subtle organic drift, never locked-off.
strategy.narrative_arc: Open on three friends in a premium coffee shop, dramatically overthinking stock charts on their phones with exaggerated concentration—one squints absurdly close, another does fake meditation, the third frantically scribbles nonsense equations on a napkin. Cut to a fourth friend casually sipping coffee, phone down, completely relaxed with a knowing smirk. End card reveals BotSpot logo as the relaxed friend winks—'Let the bots do the thinking.'
strategy.audience_hook: The universal frustration of 'analysis paralysis' in trading—viewers instantly recognize themselves in the overthinking chaos, making the effortless BotSpot solution feel like sweet relief.

cinematic_direction.mood_notes: Premium absurdity—treat the comedy with the visual gravity of a luxury fragrance ad. The humor comes from the contrast between the elevated production value and the silly human behavior. Never wink at the camera until the final beat.
cinematic_direction.lighting_notes: Soft, diffused natural daylight flooding through large windows creating heavy halation halos. Practicals from warm Edison bulbs in background. Faces lit with gentle wraparound, shadows present but not harsh. Golden hour warmth throughout.
cinematic_direction.camera_notes: Gimbal work with intentional micro-drifts, never sterile. Slow, confident push-ins on the overthinking faces. Quick whip-pan to the relaxed friend. Final shot holds steady with subtle breathing movement. All movements feel human-operated, not robotic.

production_recommendations.voice_vibe: Warm, wry, understated—like a clever friend sharing an inside joke. Think 'premium podcast host' energy, not announcer. Slight smile in the delivery.
